name: Lava lamp navigation
tagline: Create a drop down menu with a lava lamp using Jquery
body:
## Introduction
This project will help you how to create a lava lamp navigation menu using Jquery.This is not a Jquery plugin,however its ease of use is impressive.
## Usage
To use it use need to create a markup first,for this make a `div` with a `class='nav'`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
